rotate_then_press_switch.description: Rotate the switch before pressing it to adjust the temperature and flow.

push_then_twist_switch.description: Push the switch before rotating it to control the water.

wipe_switch.description: Wipe the switch to enhance its functionality.

rotate_switch_then_press.description: Rotate the switch and press it to control the temperature and the flow respectively.

press_switch_then_rotate.description: Press the switch to control the flow and then rotate it to control temperature.

clean_switch_then_rotate.description: Clean the switch to ensure smooth functioning before rotating it.

press_switch.description: Press the switch to control the temperature.

clean_switch_then_press.description: Clean the switch and then press it to ensure smooth operation.

rotate_switch.description: Rotate the switch to control the temperature of the water.

clean_switch.description: Clean the switch to ensure it maintains a smooth operation.

press_before_clean_stem.description: Press the stem to ensure its function, then clean it.

rotate_and_press_stem.description: Rotate the stem to adjust the water flow, then press it to stop.

wipe_stem.description: Wipe the stem to maintain its performance.

clean_stem.description: Clean the stem to ensure smooth water flow.

press_then_clean_stem.description: Press the stem to check functionality and then clean it.

clean_stem_then_press.description: First clean the stem to ensure hygiene and then press it for operation.

rotate_stem.description: Rotate the stem to control water flow.

press_stem_and_then_rotate.description: Press the stem to break the initial seal and then rotate it to control the water flow.

press_stem.description: Press the stem to control the water flow.

clean_and_press.description: Clean the faucet base and press the stem for operation.

rotate_and_wipe.description: Rotate the switch and then wipe the faucet base for cleanliness.

clean_faucet_base_and_stem.description: Clean both faucet base and stem for hygiene purposes.

wipe_base.description: Wipe the faucet base to remove any dirt or stains.

clean_base_then_rotate_switch.description: First clean the base of faucet for hygiene and then rotate switch for operation.

rotate_switch_then_clean_base.description: First rotate the switch for operation and then clean the base for hygiene.

clean_faucet_base_then_press_stem.description: Clean the faucet base first and then press the stem to ensure hygienical operation.

press_stem_then_clean_faucet_base.description: Press the stem to check functionality then clean the faucet base.

clean_faucet_base.description: Clean the faucet base to remove any buildup of grime and dirt.

clean_and_operate.description: Clean the whole faucet, then rotate the switch and press the stem for operation.

operate_then_clean.description: Rotate the switch and press the stem for operation, then clean the whole faucet.

clean_whole_faucet_stem_first.description: First clean the stem and then wipe the entire faucet including the base and the switch for hygiene.

wipe_whole_faucet.description: Wipe the entire faucet including the base, the stem, and the switch to remove any dirt or stains.

rotate_switch_then_clean_whole_faucet.description: First Rotate the switch for normal operation and then clean the entire faucet including the base, stem and switch for hygiene.

clean_whole_faucet_then_rotate_switch.description: First clean the entire faucet including the base, stem and switch for hygiene and then rotate the switch for normal operation.

clean_whole_faucet_then_press_stem.description: Clean the entire faucet to ensure hygienic operation and then press the stem.

press_stem_then_clean_whole_faucet.description: Press the stem to check water flow and then clean the entire faucet.

clean_whole_faucet.description: Clean the entire faucet including the base, stem, and switch.
